Generate Data
=============

skedm comes with both 1D and 2D test data. These built in functions allow you to quickly explore the behavior of different systems.

1 Dimensional
^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. automodule:: skedm.data
   :members: logistic_map, noisyPeriodic, noisyPeriodic_complicated, noise, lorenz


2 Dimensional
^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. automodule:: skedm.data
   :members: chaos2D, periodic, periodicBrown, brownNoise, noise, chaos3D, randomCircles, circleInCircle, circlesWithStuff, randomSizedCircles, voronoiMatrix
